duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle all aspects of product merchandising within assigned stores using a hand-held mobile device.
Interact in a professional manner with store employees, store management, and customers.
Work on activities such as building fixtures, moving card departments, and remodeling card departments.
Consistently push, pull, lift, and carry cartons, merchandise, and display fixtures up to 30 pounds throughout the workday and up to 50 pounds on occasion.
Stoop, squat, walk, stand, climb stairs, and step ladders during the workday.
Operate hand-held technology provided to open and read documents and interpret information.
